welcome_message_body: Welcome to Ar Rusayfah, Jordan! This charming city is known for its rich history and beautiful landscapes. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that it has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The secondary terminal for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Queen Alia International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used mainly for low-cost carriers and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at King Hussein Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: VIP Terminal
terminals.description: The VIP terminal at King Hussein Airport caters to high-level government officials and VIP passengers.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
